title: Must Read: Estée Lauder's New CEO's Reset Strategy, Tory Burch Announces New Leadership Appointments
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Wednesday. Just six months into the role, Estée Lauder Companies' new CEO, Stéphane de La Faverie, is looking to give the beauty giant a business makeover. The plan includes a "radical organizational restructuring" according to WWD, to "increase ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
